ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor could literally say that she felt Prowl blaiming himself, and in part it was indeed his fault that they had died...but it was also because of him

* Iron Raptor could literally say that she felt Prowl blaiming himself, and 
in part it was indeed his fault that they had died...but it was also because 
of him that thwy were in the middle of that field right now. So, in plain, 
it almost seemed to cancle the other out.
But she knew just why Prowls thoughts had detinated their sparks, because he 
had been jelouse of something that didn't matter.

Iron Raptor watched his blank look, then seeing his head lower in shame. 
Probably because her trust wavered, but maybe also because she found it hard 
to believe that he could have ever done something like...like...botch up the 
most important thing in the world just because he was jelouse!
It was stupid, down right stupid!

She almost lost her balance as Prowl stepped back but kept it, wavering a 
bit but staying on her feel. Looking at Prowl in disbeliefe for a moment, 
then hearing Prowls thoughts and then shaking her head slightly.
No, someone else could have done better, but she couldn't put what trust she 
had felt in anybot else then Prowl.
In truth, she still trusted him, but it was so hard to think that he could 
do what he had done.
But when she heard, or felt, Prowl feel the same jelousy when he thought 
about Dinobot she found herself growling.
If she could have stepped towards Prowl she would have, but she was still 
getting use to these legs.
But she saw the look he gave her the next moment, one that seemed as if he 
was looking at ger for the last time. And for a moment she thought that he 
was going to suddenly fly away, leaving her here on her own.
But, even through all that happened, she knew that he wouldn't.

Iron Raptor could feel his feelings though, anger at himself, sadness and 
other emotions, almost making her want to suddenly hold him and tell him 
that everything was alright, but she had to get this all out into the open 
if it killed her...again.
But she just shook her head at Prowls thoughts, he wasn't a failure...he had 
only failed at the task. The merge had failed...not him, not completely.

She sighed as Prowl turned his head away from her.*

" Am I that least of a person now that you can't even look at me when you 
speak to me?"

* But...perhaps she had been a little to harsh on him before, but now her 
feelings were so mixed up she didn't even know how to feel.
But there was no use in yelling at him.*

" Prowl...I can't exactly say that what you did was alright, but I can say 
that it's forgivable. You may have killed us, but you also gave up yourself 
to make sure that we lived again."

* Then, on unsteady legs she actually stepped towards him, placed a hamd om 
his cheek and turned his head towards her so that she could look Prowl in 
the eye.
Her own face was blank of emotions, but her voice was a little hurt.*

" But how could you think something like that, how could you ever get 
jelouse over someone I don't even know? I love you and you know I do, more 
then anything in thie entire universe.
Yet you still thought that, and the price was our sparks."

* She then leaned forward and kissed Prowl gently on the lips.*

" I don't hate you, and I still trust you and love you even more.
I just can't understand why you would think such a thing."
